- Replaced "features" with "includes"
- Used "conversation" instead of "dialogue"
- Swapped "clearly audible and distinct" with "distinctly audible and separate"
- Changed "surrounding sounds" to "ambient noises"
- Replaced "vocalization" with "vocal part"
- Used "signifies" instead of "represents"
- Changed "internal thoughts or feelings" to "inner thoughts or emotions"
- Replaced "identifies the time range" with "specifies that the duration"
- Used "soliloquy" instead of "monologue"
